episodeTitle: Fists Full of Emotion! Luffy Unleashes Gatling with All His Might!
description: In the climactic conclusion of the Luffy vs. Lucci battle, Usopp reveals himself and motivates Luffy to stand once more. Despite taking Lucci's most powerful attack, Luffy unleashes his devastating Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling, finally defeating the CP9 leader and sending him crashing through the tower wall. Meanwhile, Zoro loses his sword Yubashiri to Shu's rust powers.

events.title: Debut of Marine Captain Shu
events.description: Marine Captain Shu makes his first appearance during the Buster Call operation at Enies Lobby. He possesses the Sabi Sabi no Mi Devil Fruit, which allows him to rust metal on contact.
events.significance: Introduces a Marine officer with a Devil Fruit ability that poses a unique threat to swordsmen like Zoro.

quotes.text: I ate the Sabi Sabi no Mi. I'm a rust-man who can rust all your swords!
quotes.speaker: Shu
quotes.context: Shu warns Zoro about his Devil Fruit ability

events.title: Debut of Marine Captain Very Good
events.description: Marine Captain Very Good appears during the Buster Call, demonstrating his Beri Beri no Mi ability that allows him to separate his body into berry-shaped orbs.
events.significance: Introduces another Marine captain with a Paramecia Devil Fruit ability during the Enies Lobby battle.

events.title: Yubashiri is Destroyed
events.description: During battle with Marine Captain Shu, Zoro's sword Yubashiri is completely destroyed when Shu uses his Sabi Sabi no Mi power to rust it. The blade crumbles to dust, leaving only the hilt.
events.significance: Zoro loses one of his prized swords - Yubashiri was one of the 50 Skillful Grade swords he received from Ipponmatsu in Loguetown. This is a significant loss for Zoro and demonstrates the danger of Shu's ability.

quotes.text: One of my swords... rusted away!
quotes.speaker: Zoro

events.title: Usopp Reveals Himself to Luffy
events.description: Sogeking removes his mask and reveals that he is Usopp, calling out to Luffy who appears defeated on the ground. Usopp encourages Luffy to stand up and not give up.
events.significance: This is a pivotal emotional moment where Usopp, who had been fighting as Sogeking to hide his identity, reveals himself to motivate his captain. It shows their deep friendship and Usopp's growth.

quotes.text: Luffy! Stand up! You're not the kind of man who'd lose to someone like this!
quotes.speaker: Usopp
quotes.context: Usopp motivating Luffy to continue fighting

events.title: Luffy Stands Despite Impossible Odds
events.description: After being devastated by Lucci's Rokuogan, Luffy appears defeated. However, remembering his promise to Robin and motivated by Usopp's words, Luffy forces himself to stand up against all odds, demonstrating incredible willpower.
events.significance: This moment showcases Luffy's unbreakable will and determination - a core characteristic that defines him as a character. It's a turning point in the battle and one of the most iconic moments in the Enies Lobby arc.

quotes.text: I can't fall here... Robin is waiting!
quotes.speaker: Luffy

events.title: Lucci Uses Sai Dai Rin: Rokuogan
events.description: Rob Lucci wraps his tail around Luffy to restrain him, then unleashes his ultimate technique - Sai Dai Rin: Rokuogan (Maximum Ring: Six King Gun). This enhanced version of Rokuogan has a larger radius and greater power due to Lucci's enlarged leopard fists in hybrid form.
events.significance: This is the most powerful attack Lucci possesses, representing the pinnacle of his Rokushiki mastery. It's meant to be his finishing move against Luffy.

events.title: Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling Debut
events.description: In response to Lucci's ultimate attack, Luffy unleashes Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling for the first time - a devastating barrage of high-speed punches in Gear Second. The attack completely overwhelms Lucci's Tekkai defense and sends him crashing through the tower wall.
events.significance: This is one of Luffy's most iconic and powerful finishing moves, combining his Gear Second speed with his Gatling technique. It represents the culmination of Luffy's growth during the Water 7 saga and marks his first major victory using Gear Second as a decisive factor.

events.title: Luffy Defeats Rob Lucci
events.description: Rob Lucci is defeated by Luffy's Jet Gatling and crashes unconscious through the tower wall. The battle that began in episode 302 finally concludes with Luffy's victory over CP9's strongest member.
events.significance: This marks the conclusion of one of the longest and most intense battles in One Piece up to this point. Luffy's victory over Lucci proves he can stand against the World Government's elite agents and represents a major milestone in his growth as a pirate.

events.title: Marines Announce Lucci's Defeat
events.description: A Marine gets on the Den Den Mushi loudspeaker and reports that Rob Lucci, the strongest CP9 member and a prodigy of the World Government, has been defeated. This announcement shocks all the Marines present.
events.significance: The announcement of Lucci's defeat is a humiliating blow to the World Government and Marine forces. It demonstrates that the Straw Hats are a serious threat capable of defeating even the government's elite assassins.

events.title: Luffy Calls Out to Robin
events.description: After defeating Lucci, Luffy calls out to Nico Robin, reaffirming that they will go back together. Robin tearfully smiles in response, showing her emotional connection to her crew.
events.significance: This moment is the emotional payoff of the entire Enies Lobby arc. It reaffirms Luffy's promise to save Robin and shows that their bond as crewmates has been solidified through this ordeal.

quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Luffy's declaration to Robin after defeating Lucci

events.title: Franky vs Very Good
events.description: Franky engages Marine Captain Very Good in battle. Very Good uses his Beri Beri no Mi ability to separate his body into berry-shaped orbs to avoid damage.
events.significance: Shows Franky fighting alongside the Straw Hats against Marine forces, demonstrating his combat capabilities and foreshadowing his eventual joining of the crew.

events.title: Franky Defeats Very Good
events.description: Franky defeats Marine Captain Very Good using his Strong Hammer attack, shattering Very Good's berry-form body and knocking him out.
events.significance: Demonstrates Franky's strength and his ability to overcome a Devil Fruit user's defensive abilities through sheer power.

quotes.text: Luffy! Stand up! You're not the kind of man who'd lose to someone like this!
quotes.speaker: Usopp
Luffy
quotes.context: Unleashing his ultimate attack against Lucci

quotes.speaker: Luffy
quotes.context: Calling out to Robin after defeating Lucci

themes.description: The episode showcases Luffy's incredible willpower as he refuses to stay down despite being devastated by Lucci's attacks. His determination to save Robin drives him to overcome seemingly impossible odds.
themes.symbolism: Luffy standing up after Rokuogan symbolizes the indomitable will that defines him as a character and future Pirate King.

themes.description: Usopp's revelation and encouragement to Luffy demonstrates the deep bonds of friendship within the Straw Hat crew. Despite their previous conflict, Usopp's faith in Luffy never wavered.
themes.symbolism: Usopp removing his Sogeking mask represents him dropping his pride and directly supporting his captain as a friend.

themes.description: Zoro loses his cherished sword Yubashiri, showing that victory sometimes requires sacrifice. The Straw Hats are all fighting at great personal cost to save Robin.
themes.symbolism: The destruction of Yubashiri represents the harsh reality that the crew's battle against the World Government comes with real losses.

characterSpotlights.development: Luffy demonstrates his growth as a fighter and his unwavering determination to protect his crew. His use of Jet Gatling shows how he has mastered Gear Second to defeat powerful opponents.
keyActions: Stands up after being hit by Rokuogan
Takes Lucci's ultimate attack Sai Dai Rin: Rokuogan
Unleashes Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling
Calls out to Robin to reassure her

characterSpotlights.development: Usopp shows tremendous character growth by revealing himself and encouraging Luffy despite their previous conflict. This demonstrates his maturity and loyalty to the crew.
keyActions: Removes Sogeking mask to reveal himself
Motivates Luffy to stand up and fight
Shows unwavering faith in his captain
quotes: Luffy! Stand up! You're not the kind of man who'd lose to someone like this!

characterSpotlights.development: Lucci demonstrates why he is CP9's strongest member by using his ultimate technique, but ultimately falls to Luffy's determination and power.
keyActions: Uses Sai Dai Rin: Rokuogan on Luffy

characterSpotlights.development: Zoro experiences a significant loss when Yubashiri is destroyed, showing that even strong fighters face setbacks and sacrifice in battle.
quotes: One of my swords... rusted away!

mangaDifferences.difference: The anime extends the battle sequences and adds more dramatic pacing to Luffy's stand and final attack compared to the manga.
Additional scenes of other Straw Hats fighting Marines on the Bridge of Hesitation are expanded in the anime.

trivia.fact: Episode 309 has an IMDb rating of 9.6, making it one of the highest-rated episodes in the entire One Piece anime series.
This episode marks the first use of Gomu Gomu no Jet Gatling, which becomes one of Luffy's signature finishing moves throughout the series.
The battle between Luffy and Lucci spans from episode 302 to 309, making it one of the longest single battles in the pre-timeskip era.
Yubashiri's destruction in this episode sets up Zoro's eventual acquisition of Shusui from Ryuma later in the Thriller Bark arc.
The Crazy Rainbow opening was performed by Tackey & Tsubasa, a Japanese idol duo, and was specifically created for the Enies Lobby arc.
